mapper.select: select area_name from cus_area where area_name=#{areaName}

SELECT ca.`area_name`,ca.`status`,ca.`area_id`,ca.`city_id`, cc.city_name, cp.province_name FROM `cus_area` ca INNER JOIN (SELECT city_name,city_id,province_id FROM `cus_city`)cc ON ca.`city_id`=cc.city_id INNER JOIN (SELECT province_name,province_id FROM `cus_province`)cp ON cc.province_id=cp.province_id WHERE ca.`status`!=-1
mapper.update: update cus_area set city_id=#{cityId}, area_name=#{areaName}, status=#{status}, area_isenabled=#{areaIsenabled} where area_id = #{areaId}
